description: Welcome to the InnoDataHub.<nl/>Here you can dive into artificial intelligence, access the resources you need, and bring your ideas to life.<nl/>Explore cutting-edge technologies and develop your skills with the InnoDataHub.

requireAuth.text: Please, login before proceeding to the product

graphit.title: Graphit
graphit.description: Platform for automatic creation of courses based on educational materials
graphit.longDescription:
With the Graphit platform, you can create and take courses based on educational materials in the form of graphs.

The main functions of the platform are:

  • Generating a course by hand or with AI based on self uploaded materials on the platform
  • Visualization of materials and the links between them in the form of a graph for better learning of the course
  • Ability to integrate different types of content (theory, questions, practical assignments) into graph nodes

datasets.title: Datasets
datasets.description: A platform for uploading, searching and downloading datasets
datasets.longDescription:
The Datasets platform provides the ability to upload, search and download the datasets you need.

The main features of the platform:

  • Automatic addition of descriptions and tags using AI when downloading datasets for easy search and filtering
  • Easy data sharing due to the ability to store data in open and private modes
  • High level of security by scanning data for privacy violations

booking.title: Booking
booking.description: A system for reservation of computing resources
booking.longDescription:
Booking is a convenient and easy-to-use system for booking computing resources.

The main functions of the system are:

  • Providing the ability to book resources directly in the system without using third-party persons or systems
  • Supporting different user roles to control access to resources
  • Provide a choice between GPU and non-GPU resources to perform various computational tasks

GPTeacher.title: GPTeacher
GPTeacher.description: A platform for learning to work with large language models
GPTeacher.longDescription:
The GRTeacher platform trains users to work with large language models to generate instructions that lead to more accurate and relevant answers to given questions.

The main functions of the platform are:

  • Helping users gain skills in writing instructions in different scenarios with the help of practice tasks
  • Providing feedback from AI to improve instructions
  • Objectively evaluate instructions using built-in metrics
